p: In the view of the medical field, silver NPs (Ag-NPs) have wide applications, such as skin ointments to prevent the infection of burns and wounds [ 19], to reduce bacterial infections [ 20, 21]; biomedical diagnostic tools [ 22], and in the development of medical textiles [ 4]. Ag-NPs have been fabricated via chemical and physical methods; however, biological synthesis using bacteria [ 23], fungi [ 24, 25], and actinomycetes [ 17] is preferred.
